backend/main.mo: Actor defining user profiles and attachment storage with access control, supporting CRUD for profiles and file uploads via blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature definitions, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping content in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen shown when a user without admin rights attempts to access restricted content.
frontend/src/components/AuthRequiredScre: UI screen prompting unauthenticated users to log in before accessing protected pages.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldError: Shows a small inline form error message with an icon.
frontend/src/components/forms/StarRating: Interactive 1–5 star rating input with hover effects, keyboard support, and optional clearing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal prompting newly authenticated users to enter their name and save an initial customer profile.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, and business contact info.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Displays the site header with logo, navigation, auth-aware links, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with the site header, footer, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Schemat: Renders a stylized schematic map showing a driver’s normalized live location marker.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Exports static business contact and service info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Checks if the current authenticated caller is an admin and exposes related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttachments.ts: Provides hooks to get or upload user attachments through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile and includes a helper for display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useDriverLocationUpda: Updates a driver’s location for a booking and invalidates related tracking queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for booking operations including fetching bookings, submitting bookings, assigning drivers, and updating booking status.
frontend/src/hooks/useRateCard.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and update the rate card via actor methods with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferral.ts: Contains hooks to generate, fetch, and apply referral codes and retrieve referral bonuses using actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useTracking.ts: Exposes polling-enabled hooks to fetch booking details and driver location for live tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and defines light/dark theme variables with an earthy color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, values, and mission using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin interface for viewing all bookings, assigning drivers, and updating rate cards with authentication and guard logic.
frontend/src/pages/BookCabPage.tsx: Implements a detailed cab booking form with validation, user profile integration, and booking submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays a contact page with hero section and cards showing phone, helpline, email, service area, and business hours.
frontend/src/pages/DomainSetupPage.tsx: Provides a step‑by‑step guide for connecting a custom domain, including notices, registrar suggestions, and DNS setup instructions.
frontend/src/pages/DriverLocationUpdateP: Allows authenticated drivers assigned to a booking to manually update their GPS coordinates with validation and permission checks.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Renders a hero section and accordion-based list of common customer FAQs and answers.
frontend/src/pages/FleetPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a grid of vehicle types with descriptions, capacities, features, and ideal use cases.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero banner, feature cards, and navigation buttons for booking and services.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Displays pricing ranges, factors, inclusions, exclusions, and example fare cards with a disclaimer.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page handling name, payment method, referrals, and document uploads with authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists service categories with descriptions and feature lists, plus hero and CTA sections.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows customer testimonials in a card grid with ratings, quotes, and a hero section.
frontend/src/pages/TrackingPage.tsx: Displays live booking tracking with authentication checks, booking details, driver location, and status badges.
frontend/src/utils/paymentMethods.ts: Defines payment method options and provides a helper to map payment enums to user-friendly labels.
frontend/src/utils/principalText.ts: Validates ICP principal text input and returns parsed principal data or an error message.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Stores high-level project metadata, feature list, pending requests, and state versioning information.
